snippet.title: DON'T SHOOT the Most Realistic Game You Can Actually Play  #callofduty #dontshoot
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam now ! : https://store.steampowered.com/app/2674870/DONT_SHOOT/

DON’T SHOOT is a tactical shooter and survival game where players will have to try to survive as long as possible against hordes of infected of all kinds, very similar to the zombie' mode of #callofduty  ! DON’T SHOOT offers innovative game mechanics, a unique shooting system, highly developed artificial intelligence. The scenario of DON’T SHOOT can be compared to a documentary or a report on the daily work of police or military.

DON'T SHOOT will be available to PC on Steam the 1st december 2023 !

We can play to our another games awaiting this game :
(https://store.steampowered.com/app/2565960/Only_Up_Rising/) 

DONT SHOOT brings players cutting-edge gameplay, with all-new weapon handling, advanced AI system, photorealistic NANITE technology assets, new armory and other gameplay innovations that elevate this game to total immersion.

Between thugs, infected and allies, don’t shoot too fast ! Who knows ?...

#callofduty #callofdutymobile #callofdutywarzone #callofdutymodernwarfare #dontshoot #videogames #gaming #camera #military
